document_data.name: Violet Spire
document_data.georefs: {{Cite dragon/349/The Horde: Barbarians of the Endless Waste|57-58}}
document_data.mainbody: '''The Violet Spire''' was the tower of [[Yaravindar Ipurnos]] in the [[Glittering Spires]] in the [[Hordelands]]. He used it until at least {{yearlink|1372}}.
document_data.Description: The minaret-type tower was slender and made of purple [[granite]].
document_data.Defenses: The tower had no doors or stairs, with all entry being a matter of keyed ''[[portal]]s''. A small host of surviving [[Imaskari]] [[construct]]s and summoned [[elemental]]s staffed and defended it.
document_data.History: The magician [[Yaravindar Ipurnos]] raised this tower after the destruction of [[Inupras]]. He continued to dwell in the tower until at least {{yearlink|1372}}.
